mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_members (member_token, name, phone, password, nickname, status, created_at) VALUES (#{memberToken}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{status}, #{createdAt});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_members WHERE (phone = #{loginId} OR nickname = #{loginId}) AND password = #{loginPw}
SELECT shop_token FROM tbl_shop WHERE shop_id = #{loginId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reserve (member_token, shop_token, reserve_at, personnel, reserve_menu, visit, message) VALUES (#{memberToken}, #{shopToken}, #{reserveAt}, #{personnel}, #{reserveMenu}, #{visit}, #{message});
mapper.select: SELECT a.personnel-IFNULL((SELECT SUM(b.personnel) FROM tbl_reserve b WHERE b.shop_token = #{shopToken} AND b.reserve_at = #{reserveAt}),0) as result FROM tbl_shop_reserve_personnel a WHERE a.shop_token = #{shopToken} AND a.reserve_at = DATE_FORMAT(#{reserveAt}, '%H:%i')

SELECT (SELECT name FROM tbl_shop WHERE shop_token = a.shop_token ) as shop_name, a.reserve_at, a.personnel, a.visit, a.message, (SELECT menu_name FROM tbl_shop_reserve_menu WHERE shop_token = a.shop_token) as menu_name, (SELECT (menu_price*a.personnel) FROM tbl_shop_reserve_menu WHERE shop_token = a.shop_token) as menu_price FROM tbl_reserve a WHERE member_token = #{memberToken}
